text: A carrier may refuse to transport a person or persons whose immediately observed conduct or behavior would constitute a violation of § 35-216 or § 35-251.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 44-225.

1973 Ed., § 44-217.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-18, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 35-251.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-40, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 35-251.

DC CODE § 35-252

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Carrier authorized to refuse transportation to violators.
